programme.title: Kalamehe jutud
programme.desc: Martin Narusing sai vanaisa kõrvalt selgeks, et parim, mis temaga juhtuda võib, on kaluriks hakkamine. Noor mees on vanemate lähedale Mehikoormasse loonud kodu, kus elab koos naise ja kahe lapsega. Täisjõus elu on võimalik ka kaugel suurlinna tuledest. Režissöör Ove Musting, tootja Downtown Pictures OÜ.(n)

programme.title: CEV võrkpalli Meistrite liiga
programme.desc: Bigbank Tartu võrkpallimeeskond peab Euroopa tugevaimas klubivõrkpalli sarjas kordusmängu Šveitsi klubi Lindaren Volley Amriswiliga.(n)

programme.title: Lootus
Håp
programme.desc: Enne jõule saab 43-aastane Anja (Andrea Bræin Hovig) teada, et tal on vähk ja elada on jäänud vaid mõned kuud. Naine on oma kaasast, 59-aastasest Tomasest (Stellan Skarsgård) emotsionaalselt lahku kasvanud, ja nüüd tuleb suurel perel, kus sirgumas nii oma kui ka kasulapsed, silmitsi seista ühekorraga nii surma läheduse kui ka suhete selitamisega. Nappide vahenditega mõjusalt teostatud draama, valusat teemat pole püütud mahendada. Auhind Berliini filmifestivalilt, kaks Euroopa filmiauhinna nominatsiooni. R: Maria Sǿdahl.(n)

programme.title: Lõksus
A Woman Captured
programme.desc: Bernadett Tuza-Ritteri film leiab moodsa orjapidamise ootamatust kohast, Euroopa südamest. Hinnanguliselt on praegu Euroopas 1,2 miljonit moodsa orjuse ohvrit, terves maailmas aga vähemalt 40,3 miljonit. Filmi peategelane Marish on kümme aastat toidu ja peavarju eest elanud koduorjana naise juures, kes saadab ta tehasesse tööle ning võtab endale kogu palga. Filmi autor jälgis kaks ja pool aastat kangelanna argielu, olles tema ainus sõber ning usaldusalune, ja julgustas teda hirmuvalitsuse alt põgenema. Jutustus füüsilise ja vaimse allasurutuse mõjust inimpsüühikale, mistõttu vabadus tundub hirmsamana kui orjus, leidis Ungaris elavat vastukaja. Südantkriipiv mõtisklus allumisest ja vabanemisest äratas tähelepanu ka mitmel rahvusvahelisel festivalil, seal hulgas mainekal IDFA dokumentaalfilmide festivalil Amsterdamis ning Sundance'is.(n)

programme.title: Afganistan – haavatud maa
programme.desc: 1979. aastal tungis Afganistani Nõukogude armee ja afgaanid kuulutasid välja džihaadi uskmatute sissetungijate vastu. "Nõukogude Vietnam" oli alanud.(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper satub hoonesse lilla mere kohal, kus teda kaitsevad kaks naist. Cooperi teisik ja teine toodetud teisik Dougie Jones näevad Musta Jahimaja kardinaid. Cooper satub Dougie asemel Las Vegasesse, kust prostituut Jane ta leiab ja kasiinosse viib.(n)

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Susapusa ja lapsed lähevad merereisile Vulkaan Viviani saarele, et nautida iga-aastast delfiinide tantsuetendust. Sõule saabuvad linnapea lennukiga ka kõik Okido elanikud. Ootamatult katab paks udu kogu saare, lennuk ei saa maanduda ja kogu üritus satub ohtu. Selgub, et pilv Udupea on külma saanud ja katnud kogu saare udulaamadega.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Väike printsess plaanib kosmosereisi, sest kosmoses on ju ometigi palju põnevam kui lossis! Või kas ikka on?(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Tulemas on kostüümipidu, kuid Ei-Ei arvab, et ükski kostüüm ei sobi talle. Ta otsustab hoopis üksi jääda, kuid peole suunduvad sõbrad üllatavad teda kõige vahvama kostüümiga.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Liselotte mängib peitust ja viimaks satuvad kõik loomad puu otsa, perenaine takkapihta!(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Kvasi sõidab kauaoodatud puhkusele Kookosekrabide saarele, kus loodab leida rahu ja vaikust, võrkkiiges mõnuleda ning kookosemahla limpsida. Saarel toimub aga midagi kahtlast: keegi varastab kookospähkleid, ja nagu sellest oleks veel vähe, loobib neid Kvasile vastu pead! Kapten Valge ja Peso ruttavad sõbrale appi asja lahendama.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Hannes ärkab Polüneesias. Tema sõpra Ropsi süüdistatakse hõimujumala Tiki-Tiki püha merekarbi röövimises ja Hannesel on sõbra päästmisega kõvasti tegemist.(n)

programme.title: Magus molekul
programme.desc: Kuidas valmistati ja säilitati toitu siis, kui peeneid köögimasinaid polnud veel leiutatud? Näiteks jääga! Merle ja Aigar teevad kiirelt ja lihtsalt jäätist ning jäätükid on ka teaduskatse peamised komponendid. Saate tootja Black Plastic Media Productions OÜ, režissöör Ivan Pavljutškov, toimetaja Helen Saluveer, produtsent Maria Uppin.(n)

programme.title: Karu Karla
programme.desc: Vahva sari kolmeaastastest lastest ja nende parimast sõbrast Karu-Karlast. Karla on laste lemmikkaisukaru, kes ärkab ellu ainult siis, kui kedagi teist lähedal pole. Karla aitab väikestel põnnidel üle saada igasugustest hirmudest ja muredest, ning teeb seda parimal võimalikul viisil – killukese maagia ja kujutlusvõimega.(n)

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: Võistluslikul seiklusmatkal panevad lapsed proovile oma oskused kanuusõidus, matkamises, orienteerumises ja kaljuronimises, auhinnaks on 10 000 dollarit! Zoe ja Harvey otsustavad võidu korral oma raha anda tädi Kimile, et ta ei peaks sulgema puumade varjupaika.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Noortemagasini toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Grete Lõbu.(n)

programme.title: Michelini tärnid. Köögilood
Michelin Stars - Tales From the Kitchen
programme.desc: Toidu- ja restoranikriitikud, restoranide omanikud ja kokad arvestavad väga Michelini käsiraamatu soovituste ning hinnangutega. Peale toidu hinnatakse ka restorani väljanägemist ja teenindust. Mida rohkem tärne, seda kallimad road. Michelini käsiraamat sündis aastal 1900. Kuulsad rehvitöösturid Michelinid õhutasid tollaseid väheseid autoomanikke oma sõidukiga rohkem ringi sõitma. Liikvele läinud autod vajasid uusi rehve ja kütust, sõitjad tahtsid puhata ning keha kinnitada. Nii täienesidki käsiraamatud uute soovitustega. Filmis uuritakse, mida on vaja teha kuulsate tärnide saamiseks.(n)

programme.title: Naiskonstaabel
programme.desc: Konstaabel Gina Lawson alustab esimest tööpäeva Brinfordi politseijaoskonnas, kus pole varem töötanud ühtki naispolitseinikku. Teda ei võeta täisväärtusliku kolleegina, vaid tal kästakse teed keeta, paberitööd teha, tegelda laste ja naistega. Gina taunib meeskolleegide töömeetodeid. Esimeses osas uuritakse mitut juhtumit. Leitakse lapse skelett, mis viib ammuse, kahe kadunud poisi juhtumini. Tütarlapsele tungitakse kallale ja selles süüdistatakse mustanahalist meest. Ginal õnnestub kinni pidada varastatud sigarettidega hangeldajad.(n)

programme.title: Töörööbikud
programme.desc: Nutiseadmetesse jõudnud nupukad tõlkeprogrammid aitavad meil Koreas suppi tellida ja Botswanas rongijaama leida. Siiski on valdkondi, kus arvuti niipea tõlkeabi anda ei suuda ja ilma inimeseta läbi ei aja. Krista ja Ulvi ongi need asendamatud tegelased, kes suudavad kunstinäituse või teatrietenduse pimedale nähtavaks tõlkida ning elegantselt tuumafüüsikast viibelda. Režissöör Salme-Riine Uibo, autor-toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Hannela Lippus.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Selles osas saavad Chris ja Xand omal nahal tunda, kuidas temperatuur keha mõjutab ning proovivad valedetektorit eksitada. EMO-sse satuvad patsiendid, kellest ühel on kummaline kõhuvalu ja teine vigastas kukkudes jalga.(n)

programme.desc: Tädi Ploom ja vana maatark vahetavad päevaks kohad selgitamaks, kumb neist rohkem tööd teeb.(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid

Oktonaudid asuvad asja uurima ja selgitavad välja, et tegu on kuukala Kuunoga, keda vaevab hirmus sügelus, sest tema soomuste vahel on parasiidid. programme.desc: Tareq võtab ette rattaretke läbi Rootsi teise suurima saare, Läänemeres asuva Ölandi. programme.title: Kanep: imerohi või ohtlik uimasti
Cannabis - Miracle Medicine or A Dangerous Drug
programme.desc: Ravikanepi ümber on palju vastuolusid. Seda ülistatakse ja see kohtab ka puritaanlikku vastuseisu, ent ometi on hakanud paljud riigid selle taime raviomadusi tunnustama ning Iisraelis on see tõhusa ravimina juba 20 aastat kasutusel. Dr Javid Abdelmoneim asub uurima, mis on vastuolude põhjus, ja osaleb ka ise Londonis põhjapanevas katses.(n)

programme.title: Ürgne maa Siber
programme.desc: Nii nagu on mäekurul kõrvuti paganlik ovoo ja budistlik stuupa, on mongoli nomaadi südames nii šamaan kui ka buda munk. Külastame kohalikku turgu ja nomaadiperet. Ja lõpuks jõuame Karakorumi – mongolite hiigelimpeeriumi pealinna, kust kunagi valitseti poolt Aasiat ja poolt Euroopat. Tänaseks on sellest järel vaid kivist kilpkonn ja kõrbeliiva alla mattunud rusuhunnik. Aga Erdene-zuu klooster tegutseb taas, ühendades endas erinevaid budistlikke mõtteviise. Mongoolias seiklesid Tiina Jokinen ja Peeter Vähi. Saatesarja tootja Osakond OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Riiginõunik Benda räägib Gereonile Jänicke surmast. Gereon peab Jänicke taskuraamatu leidma. Rath saab Wolterile jälile ja Charlotte satub Gereoni aidates ohtlikku olukorda.(n)

programme.title: Õnne retsept
programme.desc: Üle 450 000 taanlase võtab antidepressante, et igapäevaeluga toime tulla. B.S. Christiansen otsib koos nelja naisega teed, kuidas vabaneda ravimitest ja elada head elu. Naistel on suur soov pääseda antidepressantide lõksust. Natalie, Eva, Mille ja Camilla kohtuvad BSiga esimest korda Põhja-Sjællandis. BSil on eesmärk selge: naised tuleb ette valmistada heaks eluks. Eluks ilma tablettideta.(n)

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Willie, Joe and Albert are three retired senior citizens who are desperate to find money. As things get worse and the circumstances become more complicated, they begin to plan a bank robbery.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: During a mission to reach a habitable planet for humans, the crew of a space ship receives a radio transmission that guides them to a nearby planet. But their hopes to find a home in that planet are quickly dashed when they encounter an alien species out of their darkest nightmares.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: Jupiter Jones finds her ordinary life turned upside down, when she discovers that she's an heiress of intergalactic nobility and together with an ex-military hunter must fight to save Earth from a destructive force.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, the multinational OmniCorp is at the center of robot and weapon technology. When Alex Murphy, a loving father and a good cop is seriously injured, OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer. But Alex's life begins to change and turns upside down.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A sequel to the movie “Pacific Rim” focusing on what came after the Kaiju war and the destiny of the Jaegers technology.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Willie, Joe and Albert are three retired senior citizens who are desperate to find money. As things get worse and the circumstances become more complicated, they begin to plan a bank robbery.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: The crew of a whaling ship faces an unexpected hurdle in the form of a giant whale that devastates the ship and leaves the crew stranded at sea. With the whale after them and no hope of rescue, the crew resorts to drastic measures in order to survive.

programme.title: RED
programme.desc: Former covert ops CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) is trying to get adjusted to life in retirement but can’t seem to get over the mind dulling boredom and loneliness of life in retirement. Matters take on a different twist when Frank’s house is raided in the middle of the night by a group of assassins.

programme.title: RED 2
programme.desc: Retired CIA agent Frank (Bruce Willis) reunites his team. They're trying to track down a missing portable nuclear device. The team have to overcome an army of professional terrorists, corrupt government officials, who are also after the weapon.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: In this cop comedy, a very unlikable pair is made when the prickly FBI agent Sarah Ashburn has to team up with a crude Boston cop Shannon Mullins to track down a ruthless drug lord.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
programme.desc: A group of teenagers share the same disturbing nightmare in which they are murdered by a shady figure called Freddy Kreuger. Do they share the same dream by chance or will this mysterious character come back to hunt them in real life.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: When a crime boss threatens to harm his girlfriend, Baby is forced to participate in a heist with a few volatile individuals, which makes the whole thing a recipe for disaster.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A group of famous illusionists called the "Four Horsemen" are being chased by an FBI agent and an Interpol detective after they pull off major bank heists during their performances and shower the audience with money.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In the world of magic and optical illusions, the Four Horsemen face a tech genius who tries to exploit them, and they must clear their names before society and reveal the truth through one last stunt.(n)

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Ted Crawford is a wealthy engineer who's arrested for the attempted murder of his wife. He decides to represent himself in court where the hotshot prosecutor ,Willy, expects it to be a simple case but he soon realizes that he's facing a tough opponent.(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
programme.desc: After he has been cryonically frozen for almost 30 years, spy Austin Powers is released into a much-changed world, but his mission hasn't changed; he has to partner up with Vanessa Kensington to fight his implacable enemy, Dr. Evil.(n)

programme.title: The Sisterhood Of The Traveling Pants 2
programme.desc: The movie revolves around a group of young women and their intertwined stories. Julia, who is an actress, invites her friend, Carmen, to Vermont to work behind the scenes on a play. Lena decides to take a drawing course and Bridget is is having an existential crisis. Their experiences teach them a few lessons about love and friendship.(n)

programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.(n)

programme.desc: Milo just came out of a divorce, working as a bounty hunter , he gets a promise of a reward for the arrest of his ex-wife, which changes the course of his life.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: A unique team of four former US Army Special Forces are charged with a war crime that occurred during the invasion of Iraq. They escape to try to prove their innocence, carrying out suicide operations that require special skills, and abilities possessed only by members of the A- Team.

programme.title: The Marine
programme.desc: John Triton, a marine recently discharged from Iraq, finds his wife kidnapped by a group of ruthless diamond thieves, resulting in a chase in South Carolina to bring her back.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: The Expendables go on a mission presumed to be fairly easy, but it is far from. They face plenty of difficulties that result in a death, which lights a desire for revenge in their hearts from a killer who has enough platinum to change the power structure of the entire world.(n)

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: A computer whiz kid accidentally connects into a top secret super-computer that allows him to control the US nuclear arsenal. It turns into a game between America and Russia, and the boy innocently releases a countdown to World War III.(n)

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Rupert Pupkin is an unsuccessful, aspiring comedian who finds an unusual way to get his moment in the he kidnaps his favorite talk show host to force him to give Punkin a chance to display his talent on his show.(n)

A highly intelligent student wants to enroll in Harvard, but doesn't have the tuition fees. He moves with his friends to Las Vegas, where they us their card counting skills to win large amounts of cash in the casinos of the city.(n)

programme.title: Arbitrage
programme.desc: Hedge-fund magnate and billionaire Robert Miller is desperate to sell off his fraud-laden trading empire before the cracks are exposed, but things get complicated when he becomes embroiled in a bloody cover-up that threatens to unravel his business plans as well as his family.(n)

programme.title: Stand Up Guys
programme.desc: An old criminal named Doc (Christopher Walken) tries to reunite his old gang, to welcome his close friend Val (Al Pacino) who came out of prison, before having to carry out a hit to kill him afterwards.(n)

programme.title: A Most Violent Year
programme.desc: Set in 1981, the film focuses on the story of Abel Morales, who emigrated to the United States and becomes one of the most successful businessmen there until one of the waves of violence and corruption comes threatening to destroy everything he built for himself and his family.(n)

programme.title: Monstrum
programme.desc: Yoon Gyeom finds himself facing many people trying to get rid of King Jung Jong, while a ferocious monster attacks the kingdom of Joseon.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles are back again to save New York city, when scientist Baxter Stockman is working with Shredder to take over the city using the help of criminals from another dimension. The turtles work with April and Vernon to stop their evil plan.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie (Wahlberg), Stella (Theron) and their carefully selected team, plan a gold bar heist against their former ally-turned-enemy, Steve.

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Judge Dredd
programme.desc: In the year 2139, the Earth became uninhabitable and the increasing crime rates created a new justice system where Judges act as police, jury and executioners. Judge Joseph Dredd finds himself a fugitive after being sentenced to life in prison for murder.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi takes Danny on a trip to his home village to see his dying father, but the trip has unforeseen consequences as Miyagi reckons with his past in the form of a former sweetheart and an old rival intent on reigniting their feud, as Danny falls in love and makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of WWII, the desperate Nazis summon a creature from the depth of Hell to serve as a Nazi weapon. When US forces seize the half-blooded demon, Professor Trevor Bruttenholm takes him in and raises him to be a part of an elite supernatural team that defends the world against forces of evil.

programme.title: X-Men
programme.desc: In this world, where mutants and humans fear each other, Mary, ran from her house, traveling with another mutant, Logan. Magneto believes that the war between humans and mutants is approaching. Magneto has a sinister plan and wants Roger to join his team to help him implement it.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film director's plans to shoot his upcoming war movie in the jungle quickly go south when the film crew faces a series of complications, from land mines to local drug lords.

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Twin brothers, Chad and Alex, are separated from each other after their parents are killed. Chad lives with a wealthy family in Paris, while Alex is a petty crook in Hong Kong. Chad accidentally meets his brother and persuades him to join him in the search for their parents' killer.

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Judge Dredd
programme.desc: In the year 2139, the Earth became uninhabitable and the increasing crime rates created a new justice system where Judges act as police, jury and executioners. Judge Joseph Dredd finds himself a fugitive after being sentenced to life in prison for murder.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: Tris and Four make the hard decision to leave their home behind in an attempt to find a way to save Chicago from turmoil. However, they end up being taken to a city of hidden secrets where they end up learning the backstory of how their world became what it is.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II

programme.title: Dracula Untold

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A congressman is assassinated and a videotape of the murder finds its way to the hands of Robert Clayton Dean, a labor lawyer who gets incriminated and enlists the help of an ex-intelligent agent to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Before the events of Star Episode IV - A New Hope, and after the founding of the Galactic Empire, a group of rebels planned to carry out a very difficult task, which is to steal the charts of the Star of Death, a deadly weapon with high destructive power, which is owned by the empire.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: An evil dwarf penetrates the world between humans and mythical creatures, who declare war against the human race. A secret mission is planned to release the Golden Army, that is made up of a great number of strange and vicious creatures. Hellboy and his team are summoned to stop them and save humanity.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.(n)

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: On their way home, the crew of a commercial spaceship responds to a distress call from an alien vessel, and when they land there, they find themselves trapped with an unknown organism that attaches itself to one of them.(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ellen Ripley is thrust back into the nightmare of facing off against alien predators as she is recruited to investigate an attack on a space colony. But with the colony overrun by aliens, Ripley finds herself facing off against the alien queen.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.(n)

programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.(n)

programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Mission To Mars
programme.desc: When the first manned mission to Mars ends with a catastrophe, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the disaster and save any survivors.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: A look into the backstory of Logan, focusing on his relationship with his brother Victor, the duo's recruitment by William Stryker, and Logan's departure from the mutant mercenary squad. As he tries to live a normal life with his girlfriend, Logan's past comes calling and puts his life on the line.(n)

programme.title: Alien³
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out on her spaceship, Ellen Ripley is launched in an escape pod that leads her to an all-male penal colony. She soon comes to realize that a new breed of the terrifying alien species that has terrorized her crew came with her, and it's out to kill the inmates.(n)

programme.title: Alien: Resurrection
programme.desc: The company was able to resurrect Ripley but now her DNA is mixed with the Queen. A human/ alien hybrid, she must continue her war against the aliens.(n)

programme.desc: As she loses herself in her role as a mother and a wife, Tara soon comes to rebel against the boundaries of her life and takes a sudden decision to leave everything behind. programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: John received Teddy, a stuffed bear, on his birthday when he was a little boy, and wished that he would become alive. Now, he has to maintain the balance between his relationship with Ted, and his relationship with his girlfriend, Lori.

programme.desc: Emily Jenkins is a social worker who gets caught up in a dangerous situation after she saves a little girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that she's not as innocent as she appears.

programme.desc: When Lieutenant Thomas Hart is transferred to a German POW camp, he gets dragged into the daring scheme of Colonel William McNamara, who is using a sham trial to cover his plans to escape and destroy a nearby munitions plant.

programme.desc: Two divers are living a quiet life, but a treasure hunt gets them into trouble with a drug lord after they come upon a missing cargo in a sunken plane.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Ace Ventura, the goofy animal investigator is looking for a dolphin that is the missing mascot of a football team.

programme.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
programme.desc: Striving to be a wrestler, Zak, a man with Down Syndrome, escape his care facility to chase his dreams. Fate leads him to Tyler, an outlaw who ends up befriending him and becoming his coach.

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: A barbershop in Chicago is a place where plenty of interesting situations happen between the customers and the hairdressers at the barbershop, where each have their own dreams that they strive to reach in many different ways.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: Pat Solitano, a hothead with bipolar disorder, is fresh out of a mental institution and has to move back home with his parents. His plans for getting his life back on track get derailed when he meets the equally eccentric and neurotic Tiffany.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Don Vito Corleone,the head of one of the five mafia families in New York, doesn't want his younger son Michael to get involved in the life of organized crime. Michael feels the same, but things change when negotiations fail between the family of Don Corleone and other families about the distribution of drugs.

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: U.S. Marshall Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a convicted murderer from a hospital for the criminally insane that is located on isolated Shutter Island.

programme.title: A Family Thing
programme.desc: In the wake of his mother's death, the middle-aged Earl discovers that he is adopted and that he is half-black. As he makes the journey to meet his newly-discovered half-brother, he receives a hostile welcome that leaves him struggling to connect with his biological family.

A team of the greatest detectives is formed to retrieve these things and Clouseau is among them.(n)

programme.title: The Guardian
programme.desc: Jake is a high school swim champion with a troubled past, is under training to be a coast guard at an elite school. His mentor is the legendary Ben Randall, who puts the arrogant Jake under pressure with situations that teach him about life.(n)

programme.title: Little Man Tate
programme.desc: Fred is a genius in math and reading, but he can't adjust with other children in school, he's slowly isolated from them and finds it difficult to socialize next to those of his age, he gets help from his teacher and his single mom.(n)

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Desperate to leave town after they witness a murder by the mafia, Joe and Jerry dress up as women to join an all-female band on the way to a job in Florida. But as Joe falls for one of the band's singers, Jerry finds himself the object of affection of a millionaire who is unaware of Jerry's truth.(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes

programme.title: The Beach
programme.desc: Richard is an American college student who goes to Thailand on vacation. He meets Daffy who tells him about a secret paradise island that you need a map to get to. Richard gets the map, and meets a French couple, who he convinces to join him on his quest. They make their way to Bangkok and finally reach the island, which holds a surprise for them.(n)

programme.desc: During the battle of the French and English forces in the American colonies, English forces use the militias of the local colonial leader. A love story arises between the daughter of the English leader and a warrior which complicates things, after it became a personal vendetta.(n)

programme.title: All Creatures Here Below
programme.desc: After running into trouble, the struggling young couple Gensan and Ruby seek refuge in their hometown of Kansas City, where they're faced with dark secrets from the past.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When landing a job at her idol's restaurant doesn't turn out to be the dream Nikki thought it would, she embarks on a new journey with her idol's executive chef, who was unfairly fired alongside her, to open an eatery and develop new recipes that challenge her celebrity idol's own reign.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.

programme.title: Secrets in the Snow
programme.desc: Excited about finally meeting her beloved Ted's family in a snowy countryside, Christina makes her way from Chicago only to be surprised at an unexpected visit from a guest who is holding secrets behind the death of Ted's brother, Paul.

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Dory, the blue tang fish who loses her memory every 10 seconds, only remembers that she got separated from her parents as a child. She goes on an adventure to find them with the help of Nemo and Marlin that lead her to the Marine Life Institute, a conservatory that houses diverse ocean species.

programme.title: Honey Boy
programme.desc: Troubled by a traumatic childhood, actor Otis Lort is forced to reflect on his memories with his abusive father and how his first foray into the acting world as a child was overshadowed by their troubled relationship as his father took over as his guardian.

programme.title: I Still Believe
programme.desc: Inspired by real events, the film tells the story of Christian singer Jeremy Camp, shedding light on his crisis of faith in the aftermath of a personal tragedy and how he found his way back, using his music to heal himself and inspire others.

programme.title: Miss Arizona
programme.desc: A former beauty queen's attempt to find her way out of a lethargic mindset has unforeseen consequences. When she starts teaching life skills lessons at a women's shelter, trouble at the shelter finds her fleeing along with four women who are trying to dodge their abusive exes.

programme.title: The Children Act
programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.

programme.desc: The lives of five couples as they deal with the changes that come with impending parenthood, through the story of Alex who joins a support group after his wife surprises him with her desire to adopt a child.

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Rock star Ricki (Meryl Streep), gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom, is now returning home to make things right with her family.

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film tells the story of the members of The Women's Institue who took a daring move to collect donations. As they tried to secure the funds for a charitable contribution to a hospital, they decided to pose in the nude for a calendar to get donations.

programme.desc: Before World War II in Australia, Lady Sarah Ashley, an English Aristocrat, inherits a secluded ranch and hires Drover to prevent her new property from being taken over. programme.desc: The hot-tempered driver, Cole, enters the NASCAR race, which gets him in trouble, not just with other drivers, but also with his team members.

programme.desc: When she accidentally discovers a disturbing video from a night she can't remember, 16-year-old Mandy tries to figure out what happened and how quickly everything came down around her.(n)

programme.title: Knerten i knipe
programme.desc: When his family moves to a new house, Little Brother has trouble adjusting as he seems unable to make any friends. However, he seems more than satisfied with the relationships he does have. Until a mysterious disappearance disturbs his idyllic life.

programme.title: Boonie Bears: The Wild Life
programme.desc: With a new theme park called Wild Land having a million-dollar-prize contest, Vick takes part in it, only to find himself facing trouble when the visitors turn wild after they are transformed into animals.

programme.title: The Wish Fish
programme.desc: Opil is an 8-year-old boy who detests the dish called 'The Wish Fish' that his mother makes. Resentful of the meal, he wishes that aliens invade the planet and all the fish will vanish. When the wish comes true, a group of villains appears, and Opil starts to realize what he has done.

programme.title: The Wheelers
programme.desc: A small group of friends who call themselves The Wheelers, ride the streets on their skateboards to protect their neighborhood from crime, meet a friendly alien on the run and decide to help him.

programme.title: Pirates in Callao
programme.desc: Alberto, gets lost on a school trip to a fort called El Real Felipe in Callao, and he enters a portal that sends him to the 17th century. He discovers that Dutch pirates will attack Callao under Jacques L'Hermite, who wants to steal the king's gold and invade Callao.

programme.title: Kurt Turns Evil
programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.

programme.title: Catcher: Cat City 2
programme.desc: Stanley the investigative journalist mouse finds the ancient cat tribe in the Pafrican Jungle and realizes that the fate of mice civilization is still under threat.

programme.title: Cop Dog/ Marlowe
programme.desc: When a cop is killed, his young son tries to uncover the mystery of his murder with the aid of his dog, as a band of thieves goes after the family as revenge against the father.

programme.title: The Apple & The Worm
programme.desc: The story of narcissistic apple Torben, who, like all the apples in the tree, dreams of being shiny, afraid of anything that disturbs its beauty, and when Torben is infected with a worm ,he gets kicked out. On his journey to get the worm out, he meets other characters who change his life for the better.

programme.title: Man of the House
programme.desc: A comedy about a cheer-leading group at the University of Texas who witness a drug-related murder and a policeman (Roland Sharp) is assigned to protecting their lives until the trial. Roland hides his identity and acts as a coach and finds himself in a new atmosphere , which he knows nothing about.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss finds herself in District 13 after she literally shatters the game forever, faced with a decision that could sway the fate of her nation. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss reluctantly becomes the symbol of mass revolution against the autocratic Capitol.

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Years after his wife is killed by the criminal organization he worked for, Machete is hired to kill a senator. During the job, he finds another sniper wanting to kill him, he then embarks on a deadly mission to find those who want him dead and retaliate against the organization that betrayed him.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.

programme.title: Suspect Zero
programme.desc: After making a mistake during an investigation, CIA agent Thomas Mackelway (Aaron Eckhart) is moved to a remote area where a series of mysterious killings take place, which he believes are linked together.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: 30 years after what happened in the first movie LAPD officer K finds a secret that could cause chaos to society. During his investigation he finds former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who was missing for 30 years.

programme.title: Alita: Battle Angel
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, a scientist reactivates a cyborg with a human brain, whom he believes will be crucial in making their world better. He names her Alita, and tries to help her as she struggles to find her own identity and unlock her abilities in light of her lost memories.

War doesn't end when one goes home. After being discharged from the marines, Nelson Sanchez's homecoming brings with it a reckoning as he is forced to finally confront the violent past that he has been trying to forget.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: On a spacecraft that is supposed to carry people to a new planet to colonize it, things go wrong when a technical problem affects the sleeping rooms, prompting two passengers to wake up before the scheduled time for their awakening.

programme.title: The Art of War
programme.desc: Shaw is a secret agent working for the United Nations to keep things peaceful and cooperative. A boat of murdered Vietnamese refugees arrives at an American beach, and an assassination attempt targets the ambassador of China during the signing of an American-Chinese agreement. Shaw gets unwillingly involved in the crime, and starts to look for the true criminal to remove suspicions from himself.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: With the appearance of Electro, Spider-Man must confront an enemy far more powerful than he. And as his old friend, Harry Osborn, returns, Peter Parker comes to realize that all of his enemies have one thing in OsCorp.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: When jewel thief Miles Logan steals a huge diamond, he manages to hide it before he gets arrested. After serving two years in jail, he goes to retrieve the diamond, only to find out that the place where he hid it is now a police station.(n)

programme.desc: Agent J travels through time back to the year 1960, to stop one of the aliens from killing agent K, and save history from a real disaster.(n)

programme.desc: Ten strangers end up stranded at a deserted motel, and find themselves murdered one by one. Before more of them die, they need to find out who the murderer is.(n)

programme.title: The Aftermath
programme.desc: In post WWII Germany; Rachel Morgan reunites with her husband, Louis, a British Colonel assigned to Hamburg during the reconstruction. Life gets uneasy and turbulent when he decides to share the house with its former owners; a German widow and her disturbed daughter.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel chased the Smurfs out of their home so they head to Central Park and get help from Patrick and Grace who help them return to their village and eventsts unfold.

programme.title: The Remains
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family moves to an old Victorian home, unaware that a chest in their attic has antiques possessed by an evil spirit that soon possesses each family member as it grows stronger and nearly achieves its malevolent to kidnap the children.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.

programme.title: When the Game Stands Tall
programme.desc: The film tells the story of American football coach Bob Ladouceur who coached the De La Salle High School team and led them to win 151 matches, which is a record that has not been achieved so far in any other American sport.

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As the last of the Air Nomads, Aang, who is also an Avatar who can master the art of bending all elements, embarks on a journey to master Waterbending with the help of siblings Sokka and Katara. On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.
